name: eating
description: eating. A natural language command line food diary.

scripts.build: coffee --compile --output lib src && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - lib/main.js > temp && mv temp lib/main.js
scripts.prepublish: coffee --compile --output lib src && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - lib/main.js > temp && mv temp lib/main.js

author: Jake Mc <jake.mc@icloud.com>
